author: popef
content: Most of the non-private ones are in either the ethresearch posts or the consensus-specs repos. Some are in the libp2p's spec repo. If the work is client-specific, they are probably in those clients' repos.

content: could you link me ot some relevant ethresearch posts if yo have time?
